text: László Branikovits (18 December 1949 - 16 October 2020) was a Hungarian footballer. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1972 Summer Olympics. He was born in Budapest. He played for the national football team during the Olympics. Branikovits died on 16 October 2020 at the age of 70.Gyász: elhunyt a Ferencváros örökös bajnoka, Branikovits László ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Footballers from Budapest Category:Olympic silver medalists for Hungary
title: László Branikovits
